section.title: mrp creating exceptions for Create MRP Exceptions
section.para: To generate MRP Exceptions, select the CREATE button on the "MRP Exceptions" screen. The following screen will appear:
When generating MRP Exceptions, you are presented with the following options:

listitem.para: Select to generate MRP Exceptions for all Planner Codes.
Specify Planner Code you want to generate MRP Exceptions for.
Enter a Planner Code pattern to select a range of Planner Codes. Refine your search using Regular Expressions.
Select to generate MRP Exceptions by Planner Code for all Sites.
Specify Site MRP Exceptions should be generated for.
Specify how far into the future the MRP Exceptions utility should look for exceptions.
